attributes.action: Force international companies to pay the correct amount of tax on there sales
attributes.background:
Amazon/eBay/Google for example - huge companies that pay next to or no tax while making huge profits and shipping the money over seas. 

By making them pay tax correctly like any UK business, to be used to improve services/clear the national deficit without any extra taxes on the UK taxpayers

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition calling for all companies to be required to pay tax on their sales (or profits) in the UK.
